channel.title: Disconnecting With Client
channel.description: Ok, Well I've download a Server Source with their Client. I've started to edit a few things such as changing the old Server Name. After I did that, I compiled and restarted the server. I then tryed connecting with the Client, and whenever I connect, right when it gets in, it disconnects. I look in my Server Console, and It has no errors or anything. It just says (Playername) has logged in, and then (Playername) has disconnected.. Anyone knows what could be the problem?

item.title: Disconnecting With Client
item.dc:creator: @x_P_U_R_E_x x P U R E x
item.description:
@x_P_U_R_E_x wrote:

[quote=“Menno582, post:4, topic:278336”]It can also be you logged in with Bluurr’s client, if
you want to play your server on Bluurr’s you need to change
something in your player.java (at your source).[/quote]

Yeah, it’s Bluurr’s client… Would ya have a clue what to change in it?

Read full topic

item.title: Disconnecting With Client
item.dc:creator: @Menno582 Menno582
item.description:
@Menno582 wrote:

[quote=“x P U R E x, post:1, topic:278336”]Ok, Well I’ve download a Server Source with their Client. I’ve started to edit a few things such as changing the old Server Name.
After I did that, I compiled and restarted the server. I then tryed connecting with the Client, and
whenever I connect, right when it gets in, it disconnects. I look in my Server Console, and It has no errors or anything.
It just says (Playername) has logged in, and then (Playername) has disconnected…
Anyone knows what could be the problem?[/quote]

It can also be you logged in with Bluurr’s client, if
you want to play your server on Bluurr’s you need to change
something in your player.java (at your source).

Read full topic

item.title: Disconnecting With Client
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

it sounds like your server is blocking the UID number to the client… I personally used the UID numbers to blok SYI bot completely from my server… thats the only thing i can come up with… well its either that OR… your server requres a certain UID to login…

Read full topic

It just says (Playername) has logged in, and then (Playername) has disconnected…
